languages.text: {n}Нащупав под своей подушкой оружие, вы всматриваетесь в ту же сторону, что и Соломон. Во мраке нет ни движения, комнату наполняет лишь звук хриплого дыхания вашего любовника.{/n}

{n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow, and you peer in the same direction as Solomorne. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Нащупав под своей подушкой оружие, вы всматриваетесь в ту же сторону, что и Соломон. Во мраке нет ни движения, комнату наполняет лишь звук хриплого дыхания вашего любовника.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow and you aim it toward where Solomorne fired. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

{n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow and you aim it toward where Solomorne fired. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

{n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow and you peer in the same direction as Solomorne. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

{n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow, and you peer in the same direction as Solomorne. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

{n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow and you aim it toward where Solomorne fired. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

{n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow and you peer in the same direction as Solomorne. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

{n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow, and you peer in the same direction as Solomorne. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tâtonnez sous l'oreiller jusqu'à ce que vos doigts se posent sur votre arme, puis vous braquez votre regard dans la même direction que Solomorne. Vous ne percevez aucun mouvement dans les ténèbres et entendez seulement la respiration saccadée de votre amant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow, and you peer in the same direction as Solomorne. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tâtonnez sous l'oreiller jusqu'à ce que vos doigts se posent sur votre arme, puis vous braquez votre regard dans la même direction que Solomorne. Vous ne percevez aucun mouvement dans les ténèbres et entendez seulement la respiration saccadée de votre amant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}枕の下に隠していた武器を探り当て、ソロモーンが発砲した方向へと狙いを定めた。しかし闇の中に動きはなく、部屋に響くのは恋人の荒い息づかいだけだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow and you aim it toward where Solomorne fired. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}枕の下に隠していた武器を探り当て、ソロモーンが発砲した方向へと狙いを定めた。しかし闇の中に動きはなく、部屋に響くのは恋人の荒い息づかいだけだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Metes la mano bajo la almohada en busca de tu arma y escudriñas la misma dirección que Solomorne. No percibes ningún movimiento en la oscuridad, y lo único que oyes es la respiración entrecortada de tu amante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow, and you peer in the same direction as Solomorne. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Metes la mano bajo la almohada en busca de tu arma y escudriñas la misma dirección que Solomorne. No percibes ningún movimiento en la oscuridad, y lo único que oyes es la respiración entrecortada de tu amante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你在枕头下方摸到了武器，目光望向索罗蒙开火的方向。然而，黑暗中没有任何声响，房间里唯一的声音，便是你的爱人急促的呼吸声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow, and you peer in the same direction as Solomorne. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你在枕头下方摸到了武器，目光望向索罗蒙开火的方向。然而，黑暗中没有任何声响，房间里唯一的声音，便是你的爱人急促的呼吸声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yastığının altındaki silahı el yordamıyla bulup Solomorne'un baktığı tarafa dönüyorsun. Karanlık odada hiçbir kıpırtı yok, bir tek sevgilinin hırıltılı nefesi odayı dolduruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow, and you peer in the same direction as Solomorne. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yastığının altındaki silahı el yordamıyla bulup Solomorne'un baktığı tarafa dönüyorsun. Karanlık odada hiçbir kıpırtı yok, bir tek sevgilinin hırıltılı nefesi odayı dolduruyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du tastest mit deinen Fingern nach der Waffe unter deinem Kopfkissen und spähst in dieselbe Richtung wie Solomorne. In der Dunkelheit regt sich nichts. Der Raum ist allein vom keuchenden Atem deines Liebhabers erfüllt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your fingers find your weapon under your pillow, and you peer in the same direction as Solomorne. There is no movement in the darkness, only the sound of your lover's ragged breathing filling the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du tastest mit deinen Fingern nach der Waffe unter deinem Kopfkissen und spähst in dieselbe Richtung wie Solomorne. In der Dunkelheit regt sich nichts. Der Raum ist allein vom keuchenden Atem deines Liebhabers erfüllt.{/n}
